title: Tasty Kongunadu Kozhi Kuzhambu ( Kongu Style ) Chicken Curry Recipe
content:
Super spicy and fragrant chicken curry made kongu style with fresh spice powder and potato. This is not only easy to make but taste amazing.

This is a spicy chicken dish that tastes fantastic. It is spicy and delicious. This tastes amazing even with some pulao, biryani as well. You can even serve it with some roti or paratha too. But I enjoy it thoroughly with some rasam rice.

 

Kongunadu Kozhi Kuzhambu Recipe

 

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 45 mins

Total time: 55 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

 

FOR THE SPICE MIX

Dry Red Chillies - 100 grams

Coriander Seeds - 300 grams

Cumin Seeds - 25 grams

Black Pepper - 25 grams

 

FOR CURRY:

Gingelly Oil - ¼ cup

Fennel Seeds / Sombu - 1 tsp

Cinnamon / Pattai - 1 small stick

Cardamom / Yelakai - 3

Cloves / Krambu - 3

Onion - 1 large sliced thinly

Green Chillies - 2

Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tablespoon

Tomato - 2 chopped finely

Kuzhambu Milagai Thool - 3 to 4 tablespoon (recipe above)

Salt to taste

Chicken - ½ kg

Potato - 1 large peeled and cubed

Water as needed

 

Instructions

Sundry the spices for a day and grind it in a blender till fine. Set aside.

Heat oil in a pan. Add whole spices and let them sizzle.

Add onions, chilies and saute till light brown.

Add ginger-garlic paste and saute till raw smell leaves.

Add in tomatoes and cook till mushy.

Add in spice powders and salt and mix well.

Add in chicken and mix well.

Add water. Cover and cook for 20 mins.

Add potatoes and cook for another 15 mins.

Serve it.
